Variable.Name: InvalidFinishDate
Variable.Value: The Task "taskname" cannot finish (FinishDate) before it starts (StartDate).

Variable.Name: InvalidEndDate
Variable.Value: The activities end date cannot be earlier than the activities start date.

Variable.Name: AssignCharacteristic
Variable.Value: "Assign Characteristic" cannot be performed as the Job Activity is not a leaf level Job Activity.

Variable.Name: NewLifeCharErr
Variable.Value: Characteristic values can be recorded only for leaf level job card or job task.

Variable.Name: CannotCreatePartMovement
Variable.Value: The selected Job Card (JobCardName) has characteristics. A Part Movement cannot be related to a Job Card with characteristics.

Variable.Name: AssignCharacteristicPartMovementExist
Variable.Value: "Assign Characteristic" cannot be performed on the Job Card since Job Activity has Part Movements defined.

Variable.Name: NewLifeCharacterErr
Variable.Value: The characteristics definition cannot be added because a part movement exists for the job activity.

Variable.Name: CannotPartMovementWithJobTask
Variable.Value: The selected Job Card (JobCardName) has children. A Part Movement cannot be related to a Job Card with children.

Variable.Name: PleaseConfirm
Variable.Value:
Selected Job Card or Job Task contains Part Movements.
Do you want to create the Job Task?

Variable.Name: CancelPartRequest
Variable.Value: Are you sure you want to cancel part request PartRequestName?

Variable.Name: ClosePartRequest
Variable.Value: Are you sure you want to close part request PartRequestName?

Variable.Name: DeferredSessions
Variable.Value: Deferred Sessions are not allowed for Service Scheduler Schedules.

Variable.Name: InstallationDatecantbefuturedate
Variable.Value: "[PartName]" was not installed, because the "Installation Time" property value cannot be a future date.

Variable.Name: InstallationDatecantbeearlierdate
Variable.Value: The Installation Time cannot be earlier than the Manufacturing Date.

Variable.Name: ReturnPartsError
Variable.Value: There are currently no parts to return in the "PhysicalLocation" location

Variable.Name: ChangeLocationErrorinReturnPart
Variable.Value: The installation date of the Physical Part "[PartId]" at this location cannot be earlier than the installation date at the source location.

Variable.Name: IssuePartError
Variable.Value: Action not permitted because Quantity in Part Request is being exceeded.

Variable.Name: SetupUpgradeError
Variable.Value: "Setup Upgrade" cannot be performed as the Job Card is not a leaf level Job Card.

Variable.Name: UnInstallPhysicalPartError
Variable.Value: Do you want to uninstall the Physical Part from As-Built structure?

Variable.Name: PasteError
Variable.Value: No additional objects of type "Physical Element Revision" can be attached with a relation "Product Physical Part" under the object "RequestedAct" of type "Requested Activity Revision", because this would exceed the set limit for the secondary objects. Please refer to the rule for "Requested Activity Revision, Physical Element Revision, Product Physical Part"

Variable.Name: RequiresServiceRequirementError
Variable.Value: The object "@1" is already related to the object "@2" through the relation "Requires Service Requirement".

Variable.Name: SatisfiesServiceRequirementRelationcreationfailed
Variable.Value: Unable to create Business Object.EndLineThe relation "Satisfies Service Requirement" is only allowed for single level.

Variable.Name: DuplicateQualificationLevelError
Variable.Value: Cannot add Qualification Level. A Level with the same name already exits.

Variable.Name: UniqueAttributeNameRuleError
Variable.Value: The instance cannot be saved because it contains at least one attribute that violates a unique attribute rule.

Variable.Name: RemoveReferencedLevelError
Variable.Value: Cannot remove Qualification Level. The level is referenced by objects.

Variable.Name: QualificationlevelBlankError
Variable.Value: The operation cannot be performed, because Qualifications cannot persist without qualification levels. Please add at least one qualification level to the Qualification "@", and try again.

Variable.Name: DeleteQualificationRefByJobcard
Variable.Value: The instance is referenced.@The object is referenced by ", WorkCardName (SSP0WorkCardRevision)". Please report it to your system administrator.

Variable.Name: QualificationUserAssignError
Variable.Value: Qualifications cannot be assigned because the task "@" already has users assigned.

Variable.Name: DesignateDisciplineQualAsgnmntError
Variable.Value: Qualifications are assigned to the task. The designate discipline operation cannot be performed from here.

Variable.Name: ModifyReferencedQualificationError
Variable.Value: Cannot modify this property. This Qualification has been assigned to Users.

Variable.Name: QualificationReferencedbyanyObjectError
Variable.Value: The instance is referenced.The object is referenced by ", JobCardName (SSS0JobCard)". Please report it to your system administrator.

Variable.Name: DeleteQualificationRefByJobTask
Variable.Value: The instance is referenced.@The object is referenced by ", JobTaskName (SSS0JobTask)". Please report it to your system administrator.

Variable.Name: NoServicePlansErrorMsg
Variable.Value: There are no service plans applicable for the selected physical part

Variable.Name: SrcDisprelatetoSecReqMsg
Variable.Value: Service Discrepancy is not related to Service Requirement. Please relate Service Discrepancy with Service Requirement to create Maintenance Action.

Variable.Name: AffectingRelationMsg
Variable.Value: Satisfies or Requires relations exist on the selected Requirement(s) which affect the generated Maintenance Actions and Tasks.@SrcReq

Variable.Name: ManageDueDateMsg
Variable.Value: Maintenance Extensions are submitted for Approval.

Variable.Name: ManageDueDateError
Variable.Value: The Maintenance Action "SrcReq" is already in due date extension process. The new process, therefore, cannot be started until the previous process has completed.

Variable.Name: MACompletionErrorMsg
Variable.Value: The maintenance action "RQ1" cannot be completed, because the required maintenance action "RQ2" is still open.

Variable.Name: MACompletionConfirmationMsg
Variable.Value: Job cards are scheduled and in-progress. Click OK if you still want to complete.

Variable.Name: MACompletionMsg
Variable.Value: Maintenance Action completed successfully.
